message: Accept my generous offer and let's seal the deal!
You're not being generous enough, let's try again!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied!
Last chance to make a deal, Bob! Let's wrap this up!
I'm not falling for the 'last chance' trick, Alice. I'll try again.
I'm willing to give you the majority, Bob. Take it or leave it!
